node.Title: Announcing the Authorized Partner Service Delivery Track for Cloudflare One
node.Description: This week we’re announcing the Authorized Services Delivery Partner Track (ASDP) designed to validate partners that want to deliver services around Cloudflare One

node.Title: Cloudflare protection for all your cardinal directions
node.Description: In this post, we’ll recap how definitions of corporate network traffic have shifted and how Cloudflare One provides protection for all traffic flows, regardless of source or destination.

node.Title: Why do CIOs choose Cloudflare One?
node.Description: Today, over 10,000 organizations trust Cloudflare One to connect and secure their users, devices, applications, and data. As part of CIO Week, we spoke with the leaders of some of our largest customers to better understand why they selected Cloudflare

node.Title: New ways to troubleshoot Cloudflare Access 'blocked' messages
node.Description: Investigate, allow or block decisions based on how a connection was made with the same level of ease that you can troubleshoot user identity.

node.Title: Network detection and settings profiles for the Cloudflare One agent
node.Description: Cloudflare WARP can now securely detect pre-configured locations and route traffic based on the needs of the organization for that location.

node.Title: Announcing Custom DLP profiles
node.Description: Cloudflare Data Loss Prevention now offers the ability to create custom detections.

node.Title: Preview any Cloudflare product today
node.Description: Enterprise customers can now start previewing non-contracted services

node.Title: Announcing the Magic WAN Connector: the easiest on-ramp to your next generation network
node.Description: Cloudflare is making it even easier to get connected with the Magic WAN Connector: a lightweight software package you can install in any physical or cloud network to automatically connect, steer, and shape any IP traffic.

node.Title: Cloudflare DDoS threat report for 2022 Q4
node.Description: In Q4, Cloudflare mitigated millions of DDoS attacks. Attack durations increase, volumetric attacks surged, and ransom DDoS attacks persist. Travel & events industries were hit hardest and over 90% of traffic to Chinese Internet properties were L3/4 DDoS attacks. Read more on our recent report.

node.Title: Exploring structured data as graphs in Miro
Improve the compliance and security posture of your Google Cloud environment with Datadog
node.Description: Organizations are scaling their environments at a rapid pace, deploying thousands of cloud resources, services, and accounts. Because of their size and complexity, these environments are more susceptible to compliance issues—a misconfiguration in a single cloud resource can lead to costly data breaches. For that reason, organizations are prioritizing governance, risk, and compliance (GRC) management to ensure that their environments are configured appropriately.Datadog Cloud Security Management (CSM) supports your GRC goals by providing a single place where you can track your compliance posture, surface misconfigurations that leave your organization vulnerable to attacks, and automate evidence collection for audits.

node.Title: Welcome to CIO Week 2023
node.Description: This CIO Week we’ll demonstrate how Cloudflare is helping CIOs keep data, devices and employees both safe and fast across hybrid and remote environments. We’ll show how Cloudflare accelerates digital transformation and modernizes networking and security towards a Zero Trust model

node.Title: Datadog at AWS SKO 2023
Supply chain security incident at CircleCI: Rotate your secrets
node.Description: On January 4, CircleCI, an automated CI/CD pipeline setup tool, reported a security incident in their product by sharing an advisory. Learn about this incident, next steps, and about supply chain security.
